Will the so called “Best Friends” someone has now last forever? Why do we have friends now who will probably not be with us down the road? As I said before a friendship is someone who wants the best for someone else. It’s not a feeling it’s a decision! So if someone wants an everlasting friend they better keep communicating. Seems simple right, well it’s not always as simple as we think. We all have are good excuses to not communicate to one another. Are main one is “sorry I was busy” I’ll try tomorrow. Well what happens if tomorrow never comes? There’s this boy I know who just road his bike on the road and a car hit him and he died in a second. It’s very sad but what if that was the person somebody was going to write later? Pretty harsh, but none of us know are last days. So if somebody has something to say they better say it now because tomorrow maybe to late. Some times it’s hard to keep close friends because they move and they have there own life. So what happened there was that your fault? No it’s just life people move away and move in. If we just keep praying for that person it’s more then a letter or a visit. Just remember the definition for a friend is someone who wants the best for the other person. It’s mostly a choice we make no feelings can stay forever, but the one who gave us those feelings will. Every day we should try and make are creator the center of attention. For he is the one who made us and wants us to have friends to encourage.

Well to start what’s the difference? A friendship to the Webster’s dictionary is “the close feeling or relationship between friends.” In my sight that’s a pretty sloppy definition. Anyone can feel close to someone one day and hate them the next. So does that mean they had a relationship for just that day? My definition is someone who wants the best for the other person. Even if that “warm fuzzy feeling” isn’t there, you’re still going to help that person out. A relationship is defined as the condition of being related/connected. That’s a little better. No more feelings on this one now you’re just plain connected at the hip. So is there a difference? In my view they some what walk hand in hand. After all how could someone have a relationship if they didn’t have a friend to relate too? Yeah, I guess they could have an idol like there computer or sports, but to me that’s not really anything. Why have love for objects that won’t last instead of love for people who will last, forever?
